texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've struggled at times to get a decent-looking terminal on my desktop, and I believe I've found a good one. Toss this into your ~/.Xdefaults:
texts.text: I've struggled at times to get a decent-looking terminal on my desktop, and I believe I've found a good one. Toss this into your ~/.Xdefaults:

texts.label: code
texts.orig:
aterm*loginShell:true
aterm*transparent:true
aterm*shading:40
aterm*background:Black
aterm*foreground:White
aterm*scrollBar:true
aterm*scrollBar_right:true
aterm*transpscrollbar:true
aterm*saveLines:32767
aterm*font:*-*-fixed-medium-r-normal--*-110-*-*-*-*-iso8859-1
aterm*boldFont:*-*-fixed-bold-r-normal--*-*-110-*-*-*-*-iso8859-1
texts.text:
aterm*loginShell:true
aterm*transparent:true
aterm*shading:40
aterm*background:Black
aterm*foreground:White
aterm*scrollBar:true
aterm*scrollBar_right:true
aterm*transpscrollbar:true
aterm*saveLines:32767
aterm*font:*-*-fixed-medium-r-normal--*-110-*-*-*-*-iso8859-1
aterm*boldFont:*-*-fixed-bold-r-normal--*-*-110-*-*-*-*-iso8859-1

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Then load up the changes and start aterm:
texts.text: Then load up the changes and start aterm:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Of course, if you like rxvt better for your Unicode needs, just use this configuration:
texts.text: Of course, if you like rxvt better for your Unicode needs, just use this configuration:

texts.label: code
texts.orig:
rxvt*loginShell:true
rxvt*transparent:true
rxvt*shading:40
rxvt*background:Black
rxvt*foreground:White
rxvt*scrollBar:true
rxvt*scrollBar_right:true
rxvt*transpscrollbar:true
rxvt*saveLines:32767
rxvt*font:*-*-fixed-medium-r-normal--*-110-*-*-*-*-iso8859-1
rxvt*boldFont:*-*-fixed-bold-r-normal--*-*-110-*-*-*-*-iso8859-1
texts.text:
